BOB SIKES

COMMITTEE ON

SECRETARIES:
ADMINISTRATIVE ASSISTANT
Miss Alma D. Butler

Houge of &epresentattoe£
Mrs. Jessica Wright
Stofjmston, JD.C.
April 13, 1967
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
My dear Friend:
I have your letter requesting my support of
H. R. 6736, the Public Television Act of 1967.
This measure is now before the House Committee
on Interstate and Foreign Commerce. The appropriate de¬
partmental reports have been requested but hearings have
not as yet been scheduled.
I appreciate your letting me have the benefit
of your views and you may be sure that I will bear them in
mind at the proper time.
With all good wishes, I am
Bob Sikes
S/ja
